CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
F1           	PRIVATE PILOT FLT INSTRUCTOR     	PPF                        
F3           	COMM PILOT FLIGHT INSTRUCTOR     	CPF                        
F9           	A/LINE TRANSPORT PLT FLT INSTR   	ATF                        
TT           	PILOT NOT CERTIFICATED           	NON                        
XX           	STUDENT                          	STU                        
00           	SPECIAL PURPOSE                  	SPC                        
01           	PRIVATE PILOT                    	PVT                        
02           	RECREATIONAL PILOT               	REC                        
03           	COMMERCIAL PILOT                 	COM                       
09           	AIRLINE TRANSPORT                	ATP                        
99           	UNKNOWN/FOREIGN                  	UNK
